dmca.title: Illegal content hosted on your network --BlackSun vs. Sunusb.com--
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Steve Rogoschewsky [mailto:stever@blacksun.ca] 
Posted At: Wednesday, October 04, 2006 2:33 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Illegal content hosted on your network --BlackSun vs.
Sunusb.com--
Subject: Illegal content hosted on your network --BlackSun vs.
Sunusb.com--



        Hello, I was speaking with Matt in your abuse department (was
very 
helpful), and he directed me to your email address.   My name is Steve 
, and my business partner and I (Jay) are the owners of a federally
incorporated site (with trademarks in Canada and the USA) called
BlackSun Inc.  We were recently alerted of a site that you host, which
has taken the (copyrighted) design of our website.

        If you browse to http://www.sunusb.com  (hosted on your ip
address of 70.87.99.210), you will see the similarity to our website at
the link of http://www.blacksun.ca  .

        Matt had mentioned that this hosted on one of your reseller
accounts, so if you can kindly give him the heads up to contact his
client asap, that would be great.  We were unsuccessful in contacting
the sunusb.com person, as he appears to have an unlisted (domains by
proxy type) phone number.  We would obviously like to see this content
removed at your earliest convenience.

        If there is anything else that you need, please don't hesitate
to call or email us.

        -Steve Rogoschewsky
        http://www.blacksun.ca
        Suite 201
        116 Research Drive
        306-933-9814
